channel.title: The runescape basics
channel.description: How Do you change the texture and add parts too the map? Also, Is there a server that I can download That has no difference then what runescape used to be like? I'm not asking for runescape HD, I just want a runescape that has no changes. Such as regular attack speeds and leveling speed. I just need a basic start so I can start building. If you have any Ideas or places to get these, Thank-you very much!

item.title: The runescape basics
item.dc:creator: @fualtycannon fualtycannon
item.description:
@fualtycannon wrote:

O, i get it now. So a new source… Is there ay tools for making a source, or do I have to just download someone elses?

Read full topic

item.title: The runescape basics
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

A source is the server you code bascially.
A client is where you add in custom models and the such.

Read full topic

item.title: The runescape basics
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

fualtycannon:

How Do you change the texture and add parts too the map? Also, Is there a server that I can download That has no difference then what runescape used to be like? I’m not asking for runescape HD, I just want a runescape that has no changes. Such as regular attack speeds and leveling speed. I just need a basic start so I can start building. If you have any Ideas or places to get these, Thank-you very much!

You mean a server source you can download. and to do what you just said, you would need to edit around a client.

Read full topic
